summary:
Most of the world still doesn’t own any crypto, or even really understand what it is
Unlike other technologies, where early adopters often get burned, with Bitcoin, early adopters are rewarded, and as adoption continues, the price continues to climb
author: Eric Meltzer
The Block
title: Proof of Work: Slow and Steady
content: The following newsletter is republished with permission from Eric Meltzer of Primitive Ventures, a global venture investment firm with a focus on blockchain and related technologies. You can follow Eric on Twitter at @wheatpond and subscribe to Proof of Work here.
